**Government Notice: Solicitation Number T8493-230029/A**
============================================

**Procurement Type**
-----------------

This notice is the result of a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of one (1) BEARING INBOARD item (2 quantities) for the Bell 429 aircraft, Serial No. 57273, Tail No. 445, on behalf of Transport Canada (TC), Air Services Directorate (ASD).

**Trade Agreements and Strategies**
--------------------------------

This procurement is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and various Free Trade Agreements with Peru, Colombia, Panama, Korea, and the UK. Suppliers must be certified under the CETA, WTO GPA, or another recognized trade agreement. A competitive procurement strategy will be employed, with the selection criterion focusing on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Eligible Suppliers**
--------------------

Only Qualified Supply Arrangement holders for the T8493-140035 series are eligible to submit proposals. The following twenty-four (24) suppliers have been invited to participate:
